sampleApps.name: apex.date Demo
sampleApps.description: This is a demo app showcasing the new client side JavaScript library apex.date introduced with APEX 21.2. This library can be used to format & parse JavaScript date objects, to manipulate dates and has some useful helper functions as well.
sampleApps.author: Daniel Hochleitner

sampleApps.name: Geo Sample App
sampleApps.description: This is a demo app showcasing the new geo & spatial features introduced with APEX 21.2. It includes demos for Display Map item, Geocoded Address item & the new miniMap jQuery UI widget.
sampleApps.author: Daniel Hochleitner
